title: Altrincham
name: The Swan with Two Nicks
address: Park Lane, Little Bollington, Altrincham, WA14 4TJ
directions: Take the Lymm Road (A56) towards Lymm after about a mile turn right into Park Lane
content: Country pub and restaurant close to the National Trust's Dunham Park, hence on weekends in the summer it can be very busy. The pub is dog friendly and serves real ale including one or two ales from the local Dunham Massey Brewery.
